item.title: Colab Pro+ Features, Kaggling on Colab, and Cloud GPU Platforms
item.description: In the final, hectic days of a recent Kaggle competition I found myself in want of more GPU power. As one often does in such an occasion. My own laptop, with its GPU setup, was doing a fine job with various small models and small images, but scaling up both aspects became necessary to climb the leaderboard further. My first choice options GCP and AWS quickly turned out to require quota increases which either didnâ€™t happen or took too long.
